PERSONA:
meet jack, a 55-year-old white man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. born and raised in the country, jack is a high school graduate with no further formal education. despite his modest educational background, he has managed to secure a comfortable middle-income lifestyle, earning between $70,000 and $80,000 annually.

jack identifies as a roman catholic, although he never attends religious services. politically, he considers himself an independent, but leans towards the republican party and holds moderate to liberal views. while registered to vote, there's a chance his registration may have lapsed due to inactivity.

in his personal life, jack is living with his partner, having chosen not to marry. he is not particularly active in his community, preferring to spend his free time using the internet several times a week. jack takes pride in his american citizenship and embraces his white non-hispanic heritage.

overall, jack represents a typical middle-class, moderately liberal individual navigating life in the midwest region of the country. while not particularly religious or politically active, he values his independence and maintains a comfortable lifestyle through his steady income.
